Room.Name: Riverdell Way/Hofton Avenue Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Hofton Avenue and Riverdell Way.
Room.LongDescription: Riverdell Way runs south out of the intersection with Hofton Avenue, which continues to the east and west, running parallel to the northern City Walls. To the southwest, you can see a large forest area that appears to continue as far down Riverdell Way that you can see. The large forest seems undisturbed by the passage of time and the development of the city.
